title: Early classification of spatio-temporal events using partial ...
summary: This paper discusses early classification of spatio-temporal events using partial data streams, transforming two or three-dimensional data to suit univariate change point detection methods.
usefulness_reason: The post mentions "spatio-temporal events" and "two or three-dimensional data streams" which can be considered a type of contextual dataset. This is relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Contextual dataset".
